About Me

My name is Alex, and I am a passionate individual with a diverse set of interests and skills. When I'm not busy coding and working on various programming projects, you can find me hitting the slopes for a day of skiing, spiking on the volleyball court, or perfecting my backhand on the badminton court. I am also very passionate about competitive programming and enjoy the challenge of solving algorithmic problems. I am constantly seeking to learn new things and expand my skill set, and I hope that my portfolio will give you a glimpse of the work that I am capable of doing.
